attributes.action: liaise with our international counterparts to prevent cold calls being routed via international telephone exchanges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As more domestic companies fall foul of the telephone preference service, the most disreputable ones are using overseas exchanges to bombard households with unwanted telephone calls. It is surely not beyond our collective international wit to introduce software at various telephone exchanges to monitor large volumes of calls coming from a particular source and being routed to this country and then block them?
